law.catch_line: Any person who willfully violates any of the provisions of § 11-204(a)(1) or (2) of this subtitle i...
law.text: Any person who willfully violates any of the provisions of § 11-204(a)(1) or (2) of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500,000 or imprisonment not exceeding six months or both.
